resources.title: Heydisco: How does machine learning work?
resources.description: A high-level overview of how machine learning works. It's a good resource for beginners. It breaks down concepts into really easy to understand pieces.
resources.price: I got it on sale in November, and I couldn't find current pricing

resources.title: Deep Medicine: How Artificial Intelligence Can Make Healthcare Human again
resources.description: This is another overview of Deep Learning, but focuses on use cases for the Healthcare Field. It gave a fascinating overview of a lot of different ideas, what's being developed now, what we can expect in the future.
resources.price: Free! I borrowed the audiobook from my library.

resources.title: Understanding TypeScript - 2021 Edition
resources.description: A lovely introduction to the typescript language, with lots of focus on practical usage and configuration.
resources.price: I got it on sale for $12.00 USD. I think it's normally $99.00 but udemy has very frequent sales.

resources.title: React: The Complete Guide
resources.description: From the same presenter as the Typescript course. A very solid introduction to React. Clear presentation. Lots of code examples.
resources.price: I got it on sale for $12.00 USD. I think it's normally $129.00 but udemy almost always has sales going on.

resources.title: A Complete Beginners Guide to React: Hooks Edition
resources.description: An extremely accessible introduction to React that will get you making something real in no time at all.

resources.title: React 16 Lifecycle Methods: How and When to Use Them
resources.description: A comprehensive guide to Lifecycle Methods in React 16
